name: Duckcha
description:
Get as much tickets as you can in the Hook A Duck arcade and use them in the Gaccha! Many collectables available!

It has some bugs left, but we tried our best. Please come back after the Nokia Jam ends to get the full game :)

Thank you!

Important notes

  • If the Hook A Duck game gets crazy, stop playing until it ends on its own. It will automatically lead you to the next scene. The sound multiplying  and pixelated screen are part of this bug.
  • The prize hall isn't fully configured yet. 

Instructions

  • Navigate through menus: arrows & space to accept
  • Back/Leave current scene: esc
  • To play gaccha you will need 100 tickets.
  • Hook A Duck game: up & down arrow
    • Press the corresponding arrow when the ducks are below or near the hook.
    • Every time a duck isn't catched, you lose one life.
    • If the lives go down to 0, the level count restarts.

Extra: Change Nokia Palette with "e"

Authors

matchaberi -  Game Design, Art, Music, Programming (Lead Game Designer)

sergslk - Game Design, UI Art, Programming
